name: Firefox - No-fuss error page
description: Why read unuseful (and/or lengthy) troubleshoot instructions when you can mash your F5 key/try again button? This style will remove that text and leaves you with a straight and simple error message. No more lengthy details. Great for gen. tl;dr.
additional_info: - Added an option to replace the try again button with a message ("press F5 to refresh the page")

style_setting_options.label: Use message
style_setting_options.value:
#errorLongDesc, #errorTryAgain{display: none}
#errorLongContent:after{content: "press F5 to refresh the page"; font-size: 200%}
